title: I got 85 percent in the class 10 board exam. Can I get science? - Quora

response.answer_text: See taking any type of stream whether it's science commerce for arts it totally depends on you in which you have interest I want to tell every generation and every students of class 10th or higher secondary students that work on that in which you have interest don't work on any suggestion for aur anything that make you to change your interest.we only can suggest you that which stream is best and which is not for you but totally it all depends on you will stream you have to take is a good stream if you I want to take science you should have interest in chemistry physics maths which are main subjects in science and if you don't have interest in this subjects don't take whether anyone say that science is a good or not if you don't have interest don't take it thank you.

Yes, you can definitely get science. It depends on you if you want to take admission in science than you will definitely get it. Marks do not matters for that. Its your choice that you want to continue with science or something else.
